p: The electrochemical behavior of [NiAmben] was investigated by cyclic voltammetry, using three different organic solvents with Et 4NBF 4 as the supporting electrolyte. The solvents (DCE, a 50:50 ( v/ v) EC/DEC mixture, and DMSO) were selected based on their Gutmann donor numbers (DN) to provide media with varying Lewis basicity (the values of DN are 0 for DCE, 16.4 for EC, 15.1 for DEC, and 29.8 for DMSO).
